sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Two-level nesting review:

I know that you go → ?
I think that it's good → ?

(Answers: mi djuno lo du'u do klama, mi jinvi lo du'u ri xamgu)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
cilre x1 learns x2 from source x3 learn
ctuca x1 teaches x2 to x3 by method x4 teach

Three-Level Nesting

mi djuno lo du'u do djica lo nu cilre

I know that you want to learn.

Structure:

  1. mi djuno lo du'u... (I know that...)
  2. do djica lo nu... (you want to...)
  3. cilre (learn)

Breaking It Down

Level Content
1 (outer) mi djuno lo du'u...
2 (middle) do djica lo nu...
3 (inner) cilre

More Examples

la .alis. cu jinvi lo du'u mi djica lo nu do klama

Alice thinks that I want you to go.

mi krici lo du'u do djuno lo du'u ri prami mi

I believe that you know that she loves me.

Key Point

Each level adds another layer of abstraction. Read from outside in.

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Three Levels

Translate:

  1. I know that you want to learn.
  2. Alice thinks that Bob wants to go.
  3. I believe that you know that it's true.
Answers
  1. mi djuno lo du'u do djica lo nu cilre
  2. la .alis. cu jinvi lo du'u la .bob. cu djica lo nu klama
  3. mi krici lo du'u do djuno lo du'u ri jetnu

Exercise 2: With cilre/ctuca

Translate:

  1. I learn Lojban.
  2. Alice teaches Bob.
  3. I know that you want to teach.
Answers
  1. mi cilre la .jbobau.
  2. la .alis. cu ctuca la .bob.
  3. mi djuno lo du'u do djica lo nu ctuca

Exercise 3: Parse

What does this mean?

mi jinvi lo du'u do djica lo nu mi cilre la .jbobau.
Answer

I think that you want me to learn Lojban.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I learn from you." → mi cilre fi do
  2. "I know that you want to learn." → mi djuno lo du'u do djica lo nu cilre
  3. "Alice teaches me." → la .alis. cu ctuca mi

Summary

You practiced three-level nesting. Each abstraction layer adds complexity. Parse from outside in.
